EmailTemplate.subject: Further information required to complete your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Parent_Name__c},
We are looking forward to having {!Contact.FirstName} take part in The Challenge.
Please complete your online application to provide us with some necessary further information about {!Contact.FirstName}. This includes full medical, behavioural and dietary information, and the name, telephone number and address of {!Contact.FirstName}'s GP.
Please complete the application online within two weeks of receiving this email. Go to www.the-challenge.org, and log in. Please click "recover login" if you have forgotten your log in details.
If {!Contact.FirstName} suffers any illness or significant injury after your completion of the application, please immediately notify us of this in writing.
If you have any questions about your application or wish to be sent a paper copy of this form, please do contact us by telephone on 020 7921 4404 or email us at contact@the-challenge.org.
We will be in touch in due course with further details regarding the programme. We will also be holding a meeting before the summer to give you the opportunity to meet with us shortly before The Challenge begins.
Kind regards,
Benny Goodman
